name: soft-boiled
effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.
short_effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Recovers up to half the user’s maximum HP.
flavor_text.emerald: Recovers up to half the user’s maximum HP.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Heals the user by up to half its full HP. It can be used to heal an ally.
